sources.title: Tito's Guitar (1942)
sources.description: Tito comes on his trusty burro to sing to his lady love, but his singing and guitar playing disturbs the girl's father. The father peppers Tito with a load of buckshot and Tito takes off in a cloud of dust. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/titos-guitar-1942/

metadata.Plot: Tito comes on his trusty burro to sing to his lady love, but his singing and guitar playing disturbs the girl's father. The father peppers Tito with a load of buckshot and Tito takes off in a cloud of dust.
